item.description:
It's a Kate-a-palooza Workshop!

For this workshop meetup, Kate B. AND Kate R. will have pieces for our perusal in the Files page (under the More drop-down list on the home page). The pieces will be clearly marked and will be available for your to read by noon the Saturday before workshop. Read, critique, and come for some good conversation about writing!

Interested in submitting a piece (fiction, non-fiction, memoir, poetry, etc.) for future pondering? Email Kate E. to be scheduled. And don't worry - people who are not named Kate are highly encouraged to submit and attend as well. :)
item.name: An Abundance of Kates Workshop
